Modules Documentation¶

class extraction_oop.MovieDetailsExtractor¶

This class is responsible for extracting details from each movie page.

static extract_movie_details(movie_url: str) → dict¶

This static methode responsible for extracting required movie information from each movie url from movies list

Args:

movie_url (str): movie url

Returns:

movie_details (dict): This will contains all required information for each movie.

class extraction_oop.MovieDetailsFetcher(base_url: str, filmography_url: str)¶

This class ties everything together to fetch movies and their details.

fetch_movie_details() → list¶

This methode is responsible for getting all movies details as list.

Returns:

moviles_detail_list (list) : This will contain list of all movies details dictonary

class extraction_oop.MovieParser(base_url: str)¶

This class is responsible for parsing movie links from a given filmography page.

parse_movies(filmography_url: str) → list¶

Extract required details from filmography url and create a list

Args:

filmography_url (str): This is Filmography url where we need to hit the request.

Returns:

movies (list): Extract url for each movie and create a list after concatinating with base url..

class extraction_oop.PageFetcher¶

This class is responsible for fetching the content from a given URL.

static fetch_page(url: str) → bytes¶

Fetch the page content from the given URL.

Args:

url (string) : Target url to hit the request.

Returns:

response.content (Byte) : Response from the request

This module is responsible for setting connection with postgress and loading dataframe in Database Table.

class load.DataFrameLoading(connection_object, dataframe, table_name)¶

This class is responsible for executing SQL query

main.py

This module provides functionality to Execute Extract, Transform and Load Process in Sequence.

Author: Jahid Sheikh Date: 2025-03-09

This Module is resonsible for transfrming data into appropiate format as per the business requirment

class transformer_oop.DataFrameCreate(movies_details_list: list)¶

This class is responsible for creating a dataframe

create_dataframe()¶

This methode will create and return a dataframe.

Returns:

movies_dataframe_raw (dataframe): This dataframe contain all the movie information.

class transformer_oop.DataFrameStructureClean(movies_dataframe_raw: DataFrame)¶

This Class is responsible for performing DDL operations on dataframe as per the business requirment

convert_cols_lower()¶
this methode is responsible for converting all the columns into lower case

and replace the space with undescore value

Returns:

movies_dataframe_raw (DataFrame): DataFrame with all columns in lowercase.

date_transformation(cleaned_dataframe, column_name, new_column)¶

This Methode perform transformation on release_date Column

rowlist_to_delimited(cleaned_dataframe)¶

This Method iterate over each column and if there is any list within the column convert that list into comma delimited value

static transformation_on_row(row: Series)¶
This is Static methode takes argument as row and convert each column list into delimited value

and replace all column NaN values with business default value.

Args:

row (Series): Contain Each column value from DataFrame

Returns:

row (Series): Returns modified Series.

class transformer_oop.Transformer(movies_details_list)¶

This class is responsible for organising classes with transformer module
